name: Train Adventure Sim
description:
This metro train will give you the chance to drive a train in a big city environment. You have to pick passengers from one station and drop them at their destination. This city metro train simulator will test your ultimate pro driving skills. Controlling long vehicle on sharp turns is not an easy task

Features:
- 3D Metro Train Driving Simulator with various Trains
- Realistic 3D city environment
- Easy & User friendly game controls
- Endless Fun for Both Adults & Kids
- Realistic pick and drop for passengers
- Challenging train transport levels
